body_en: One example of a crime that the Russian media has repeatedly blamed on "Nazis" is attacks on their own civilian targets. One such case was the air attack on a theatre in Mariupol on March 16, 2022. Civilians were hiding in the theatre. The Russian Defense Ministry reported that Russian aircraft did not strike the drama theatre in Mariupol, and instead accused Ukraineâ€™s  Azov battalion of bombing it.
